All Implemented Interfaces:
org.puremvc.java.multicore.interfaces.IMediator, org.puremvc.java.multicore.interfaces.INotifier, IPipeListener
public class JunctionMediator
extends org.puremvc.java.multicore.patterns.mediator.Mediator
implements IPipeListener

Junction Mediator.

A base class for handling the Pipe Junction in an IPipeAware Core.

Method Detail

listNotificationInterests

public java.lang.String[] listNotificationInterests()
List Notification Interests.

Returns the notification interests for this base class. Override in subclass and call super.listNotificationInterests to get this list, then add any sublcass interests to the array before returning.

Specified by:
listNotificationInterests in interface org.puremvc.java.multicore.interfaces.IMediator
Overrides:
listNotificationInterests in class org.puremvc.java.multicore.patterns.mediator.Mediator

handleNotification

public void handleNotification(org.puremvc.java.multicore.interfaces.INotification note)
Handle Notification.

This provides the handling for common junction activities. It accepts input and output pipes in response to IPipeAware interface calls.

Override in subclass, and call super.handleNotification if none of the subclass-specific notification names are matched.

Specified by:
handleNotification in interface org.puremvc.java.multicore.interfaces.IMediator
Overrides:
handleNotification in class org.puremvc.java.multicore.patterns.mediator.Mediator

handlePipeMessage

public void handlePipeMessage(IPipeMessage message)
Handle incoming pipe messages.

Override in subclass and handle messages appropriately for the module.

Specified by:
handlePipeMessage in interface IPipeListener
